item.title: Deodorant sold by Walmart, Amazon recalled nationwide
item.description: The FDA recommends discarding recalled products or returning them to the retailer where they were purchased.

item.title: Undercover drug buy nearly turns deadly
item.description: Undercover drug buy nearly turns deadly

item.title: 3 people are still missing from deadly July 4 floods in Texas county, down from nearly 100
item.description: The announcement comes after people who had previously been reported missing have since been accounted for.

item.title: Myakka City neighbors oppose new development
item.description: A community strategy meeting was held where they could learn about the new development and how to speak out when it comes to official commission meetings.

item.title: Commercial pilot makes ‘aggressive maneuver’ to avoid mid-air collision with Air Force B-52 bomber
item.description: A Delta pilot made an “aggressive maneuver” to avoid a mid-air collision with a U.S. Air Force B-52 bomber.

item.title: Habitat for Humanity build site allegedly burglarized in St. Petersburg, man arrested
item.description: Thousands worth of tools and supplies stolen from a local non-profit home build site.

item.title: Elon Dula found guilty of Second-Degree Murder in 2022 Cabana Inn Shooting
item.description: Dula was found in room unconscious with victim and spent bullet casings.

item.title: Hot again today with better rain chances this week
item.description: Hot with rain on the way

item.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter’s stepson allegedly killed son in shooting accident, reports say
item.description: Dog’s stepson Gregory Zecca allegedly shot his teenage son at an apartment in Naples, Florida, on July 19.

item.title: Caught on camera: Undercover detective robbed during drug buy
item.description: Both suspects brandished firearms and demanded his cash.

item.title: 27-year-old last seen in Sarasota now missing one year
item.description: 27-year-old Felicia Adams sent a text to her mother one year ago today. That was the last time she was heard from.

item.title: Lucky coyote gets help after being hit by car
item.description: Wile E. suffered from two broken legs on his left side but is expected to fully recover.
